name: omnishelf-website
description: JavaScript and CSS files for OmniShelf website

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: uglifyjs js/*.js -o dist/js/landing-page.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs js/global-components.js -o dist/js/global-components.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs js/partners-parallax.js -o dist/js/partners-parallax.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs js/blog-toc.js -o dist/js/blog-toc.min.js -c -m
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Build complete! Minified files are in dist/ folder'

author: OmniShelf
